content:
I just tried to write #print structure Field, wondering if that would print anything special. It didn't, but did tell me about the command #print equations Nat.add, which I didn't know existed before.
Also it states that #print tactic is supposedly a thing, but Lean doesn't seem to recognize that (I do know about #help tactic, which is also useful).
The lean3 #print structure functionality was integrated into#print itself in lean4#3768.
Which is, of course, much nicer than having a separate command. :smile:
